#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    int n, ans = -999999999, temp;
    scanf("%d", &n);
 
    int arr[n+1][n+1], sum[n+1][n+1];
    for (int t = 0; t <= n; t++)
        sum[0][t] = sum[t][0] = 0;
        
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
    {
        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++)
        {
            scanf("%d", &arr[i][j]);
            sum[i][j] = sum[i][j-1] + sum[i-1][j] - sum[i-1][j-1] + arr[i][j];
        }
    }
 
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
    {
        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++)
        {
            for (int k = 1; k <= i; k++)
            {
                for (int l = 1; l <= j; l++)
                {
                    temp = sum[i][j] - sum[k-1][j] - sum[i][l-1] + sum[k-1][l-1];
                    if (temp > ans) ans = temp;
                }
            }
        }
    }
 
    printf("%d\n", ans);
    return 0;
}
